title: Bastiaan Ort
text: Bastiaan Ort (born 6 January 1854 in <a href="Gorinchem">Gorinchem</a> – died 4 November 1927 in <a href="The%20Hague">The Hague</a>) was a Dutch lawyer, judge and politician. As an independent <a href="liberalism">liberal</a> he was <a href="Ministry%20of%20Security%20and%20Justice%20%28Netherlands%29">Minister of Justice</a> in the <a href="Cort%20van%20der%20Linden%20cabinet">Cort van der Linden cabinet</a> from 1913 to 1918.
